description.en:
Through blockchain technology, we aim to create a traceability of supply chain, quantifiable credit, transparent data, and integrate consumer shopping, membership services, precision marketing, and centralized procurement to form online e-commerce transactions and offline shopping. Experience and build a new retail ecosystem that is multi-participating and benefiting from multiple parties.

BCAC is one of the world’s first and most secure application chains using the RAFT Distributed Consensus algorithm. The BCAC consensus algorithm combines the RAFT and S2B2C business models to address the most important issues in the application chain: the contradiction between decentralization and performance.
